title: The complete poetical and prose works of Robert Burns:
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: You will find it in the Museum, " I hae been at Crookieden," &c. I would advise you, m this musical quandary, to oft'er up your prayers to the muses for inspiring direction ; and, in the meantime, waiting for this direction,  bestoiv a libation to Bacchus ; and there is not a doubt but you will hit on a judicious choice.
